Vindictus.[CMTY] GM COIN S4: I Spy with My Little:
]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3953157/19665237b0f9d197088055d55294fac54253c4ca.jpg[/img]

Event Period: 9/24/2024 (Mon) after weekly maintenance - 10/15/2024 (Tue) before weekly maintenance

 

Mercenaries,

Is everyone familiar with the game, ‘I spy?’

We come up with an object in mind, and you will be guessing what we’re thinking of!

How familiar with the world of Vindictus are you?

 

Now, it’s time to begin.

I spy with my little eye…

 
[b]Event Info:[/b]
Each week, a new quiz will be revealed, starting the timer.
Once the quiz begins, you will have one week to find the exact target that we are thinking of, based on the hint given in the questions.
After a week, the former quiz will be closed, and you will not be able to add any answers.
Answer the question with a screenshot through the comment section of the post with the question.
 
[b]Information Needed to Participate:[/b]
[list][*]Server[/*][*]The Answer of the Week[/*][*]Screenshot of the answer[/*][/list]
 

[b]Reward Info:[/b]
[list][*]If over 20 answers are submitted each week, a coupon code containing **10 GM Coins** will be revealed to everyone.[/*][*]Otherwise, it will be exclusively disclosed to participants, regardless of validity of answers.[/*][*]Screenshots and Forum posts submitted may be used in future social posts.[/*][*]You may not participate multiple times.[/*][/list]


[b]Please Note:[/b]
[list][*]Each person can only participate once per week.[/*][*]Rewards will be given during maintenance on October 15th.[/*][*]Replies that are irrelevant or participation with other people's screenshots will not be counted.[/*][*]Replies that do not meet the Participation Format will not be counted.[/*][*]Submittions may be used in our official social accounts.[/*
